name: Bit.ly linker
author: Andy Gaukrodger

sections.description:
Bit.ly linker is a WordPress plugin that will automatically create bit.ly links for each post that you publish. You can specify Google tracking code so that the bit.ly link is automatically tracked in Google Analytics.

URL: http://isitablog.co.uk/bitly_linker
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Activate it from the WordPress plugins menu
  3. In WordPress settings you will see Bitly Linker Settings
  4. Enter your Bitly username API Key and Analytics data
  5. Add the Bitly Linker widget to your sidebar
  6. Enjoy
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First stable launch.

1.01

  • Fixed permalink/non-permalink error. Works with both types of urls now.

1.1

  • Bit.ly link now available within the admin area once post is published.
